column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////- As for the food
column3: I was feeling a little ill that day and ordered something simple
column4: which was fine. My dining companions both had the cinnamon spice pumpkin pancakes and felt they would have been better off at IHOP. Again
column5: nothing wrong with the food... but to wait 45 minutes for a table for this food? Definitely not worth it.
